allow: Bash(psql postgresql://postgres.xawypsrotrfoyozhrsbb:Nqf6tCgDSrXbO8kU@aws-0-ap-northeast-2.pooler.supabase.com:6543/postgres -c "SELECT con.conname, pg_get_constraintdef\(con.oid\) FROM pg_constraint con JOIN pg_class rel ON rel.oid = con.conrelid WHERE rel.relname = ''execution_audit_runs'' AND con.contype = ''c'' AND con.conname LIKE ''%operation_type%'';")
